cliArguments.until: Repeats the nested actions until a condition is met. All conditions under [ConditionsFactory] are available.

description: Repeats a subset of actions for a given number of times or until condition is met. This action is recursive and actions subset can be another [Repeat] action.

examples.description: Repeat [SendKeys] action with [a] argument into [//input[@id="SearchString"]], 10 times.
Repeat [Click] action on [//a[contains(.,"Next") and @class="btn btn-default "]], until element [//a[contains(.,"Next") and @class="btn btn-default disabled"]] exists.
examples.literalExample:
repeat {{$ --until:exists}} on {//a[contains(.,"Next") and @class="btn btn-default disabled"]}
    > click on {//a[contains(.,"Next") and @class="btn btn-default "]}

examples.description: For each repeat [SendKeys] action with [a] argument into [//input[@id="SearchString"]], repeat [SendKeys] action with [b] argument into [//input[@id="SearchString"]] (repeat inside repeat).

name: Repeat

properties.argument: Number of times to repeat the actions subset.
